captions.text: Oh, this is my new girlfriend. Beth.
It's nice to meet you Beth. I'm Tom.
We are just playing some Halo.
Err no thanks, I don't really play video games.
What the hell is going on?!
You're supposed to be covering me Tom!
This is insane and i'm gonna to leave.

Okay, guys. Just put the guns down and no
one will get hurt.
NO! THIS APARTMENT IS FOR GAMERS! HOW COULD YOU BRING THIS FILTH INTO OUR HOM-
Look, i'm just in the middle of something.
BEFORE SHE CAME INTO OUR LIVES THE MOMENT YOU SAW THAT CONTROLLER YOU WOULD'VE PICKED

IT UP AND... I CAN'T EVEN LOOK AT YOU ANY
MORE.

Okay, i'll play Xbox. Everyone just put the
guns down and I'll play.

comments.text:
How ole were they when these were made?
It feels so weird, since I was looking so much up to these cool looking 
adult people and now I am about their age and watching these videos again...
Nostalgia...﻿

comments.text:
A vegan, while does not eat meat, also does not consume butter, cheese, 
milk, eggs, ice-cream, moose, gelatin, honey, certain creams, or whey. 
(Basically any food that comes from an animal)
They also don't use things like hide, fur, wool, lipsticks, certain soaps, 
lubes, rubber, tallow, shaving creams, other cosmetics, feathers, certain 
shoes, certain brushes, yarn, socks, lotions, shoe polish, and many more 
things.﻿
